message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a unique item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to start with a price of $15000 for the product.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm interested in the product but would need a lower price to proceed.  I'm willing to offer $9000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $9000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $12500 for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $10500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price for both of us.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to stay above my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $11500 for the product.
Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still not comfortable with $11500. I'm willing to go up to $11000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to stay above my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $11800 for the product.
